Generation IV.Diamond: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.
Generation IV.Pearl: It likes places where people gather. It mimics foes to confuse them, then makes its getaway.
Generation IV.Platinum: It mimics the expressions and motions of those it sees to understand the feelings of others.
Generation IV.HeartGold: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
Generation IV.SoulSilver: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!

Generation VI.X: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
Generation VI.Y: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It does its absolute best to mimic the movements and expressions of its opponents, but it's still not very good at it.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: When this gifted mimic surprises an opponent, Mime Jr. feels so happy that it ends up forgetting it was imitating something.

Generation VIII.Sword: It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra effort into copying the graceful dance steps of Mr. Rime as practice.
Generation VIII.Shield: It looks for a Mr. Rime that's a good dancer and carefully copies the Mr. Rime's steps like an apprentice.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It habitually mimics foes. The mimicked foe is said to be unable to look away from Mime Jr.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It likes places where people gather. It mimics foes to confuse them, then makes its getaway.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Known to turn up in bustling marketplaces now and again. It mimics people much as a child would, then watches how they react, eyes sparkling.

Generation IV.HeartGold: Breed Mr. Mime holding an Odd Incense
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Breed Mr. Mime holding an Odd Incense
